headline: US rig count up one as prices climb
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was unchanged this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 244 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 298 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up one from last week at 544 rigs. A year ago, 576 rigs were active. The count shows that 411 rigs sought oil, up one from the previous week, and 122 explored for ...
